references: S. Ferenczi, Complexity of sequences and dynamical systems, Discrete Math., 206 (1999), 145-154.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
prog: (Haskell)a049321 n = a049321_list !! na049321_list = 0 : 0 : 1 : 2 : f [0,0,1,2] where   f xs = drop (length xs) ys ++ f ys where     ys = concatMap ch xs     ch 0 = [0,0,1,2]; ch 1 = [1,2]; ch 2 = [0,1,2]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 14 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 12 2000
